name: Stormwing Eagle

physical_description.appearance: A magnificent eagle with wingspan reaching 20 feet. Feathers shimmer with electrical energy, and its eyes hold an intelligence that rivals many humanoids.

abilities.name: Storm Calling
abilities.description: Can summon localized storms and ride lightning currents

abilities.name: Rider Bond
abilities.description: Forms deep mystical connection with worthy humanoid riders

abilities.name: Weather Sense
abilities.description: Instinctively knows weather patterns days in advance

mount_capabilities.bonding_requirements: Must prove courage in a storm and demonstrate respect for the sky

habitat.territorial_behavior: Claims entire mountain ranges, shares territory with bonded riders

lore_significance: Stormwing Eagles represent the pinnacle of mount-capable monsters. Their ability to bond with humanoid riders makes them invaluable companions, though they remain fundamentally limited by their divine influence ceiling. These bonds often last for the lifetime of both creatures.
